metadata.name: Safety Bombs
metadata.description:
Put on your hard hats with Safety Bombs, a new bomb item from a scrapped Antibirth concept that protects you at all costs!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/zx4jgfI.png[/img]
[b][h1]-------------------------- 𝐒𝐚𝐟𝐞𝐭𝐲 𝐁𝐨𝐦𝐛𝐬 -------------------------[/h1][/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/FepDwzf.png[/img] [i]For your own good[/i] | Quality: 2 [list] [*][u][b]Item Pools[/b][/u] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/SGcVYIJ.png[/img] Treasure [img]https://i.imgur.com/SGcVYIJ.png[/img] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/ZImT7rM.png[/img] Greed Treasure [img]https://i.imgur.com/ZImT7rM.png[/img] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/OUrmcOV.png[/img] Bomb Bum [img]https://i.imgur.com/OUrmcOV.png[/img] [/list] [/list] [list] [*][u][b]Effects[/b][/u] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/fFC05xZ.png[/img] [b]+5 Bombs[/b] on pickup [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/5iQSa3y.png[/img] Placed [b]bombs don't explode[/b] until the player [b]leaves its explosion radius[/b] [/list] [/list] [b][h1]----------------------- 𝐌𝐨𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 ----------------------[/h1][/b][list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]External Item Descriptions[/url] (English [img]https://i.imgur.com/11ORCm6.png[/img] Español [img]https://i.imgur.com/BCCFhHE.png[/img] Pусский [img]https://i.imgur.com/vFcOh4w.png[/img]) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2376005362]Encyclopedia[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Minimap Items[/url] [/list] [img]https://i.imgur.com/9Lz5VfQ.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫, 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url] [*][u]𝐀𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐭[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/funnynotename]The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/url] [*][u]𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url]
